description:
Sleek sunnies with a retro wrap. Hitting the trails on a bluebird day, or hitting your favourite sun-soaked patio, the Carnaby sunglasses will help you focus on the important things.

  • Adjustable anti-slip nose pads and temple tips keep the glasses in place
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 8-base lens curve provides face hugging coverage
name: Ryders Eyewear Carnaby Sunglasses - Unisex

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Poly Matte Black/Grey Len)
Visible Light Transmission (Poly Matte Demi/Brown Len)
